summary: A man is stuck living his life in the same 59 minute time frame. He tries various methods of finding out why, eventually consulting a physicist.
cast: Jane Alden|Don Amendolia|John Bachelder|Laura Harrington|Philip Morton|Mark Neely|Tom Reed|Kurtwood Smith|Bill Squier|Ric Stoneback|Robert M. Taub|Rick Ford|Kirk R. Thatcher|Caroline Sposto|Joe Casino|Helen Kelly|Richard Lupoff
keywords: time|trapped in a time loop|acronym in title|time for title|time loop
title: 12:01 PM
